scripts.gen:title: ./node_modules/.bin/ascii-themes generate --font='Tile'  --themeName='Monokai Dimmed' --text='Hexagonal Architecture'
scripts.gen2:subtitle: ./node_modules/.bin/ascii-themes generate --font='Slant Relief'  --themeName='Monokai Dimmed' --text='Ports and Adapters, DDD, DI & IOC'

scripts.gen: npm run gen:title > out.txt && npm run gen:subtitle >> out.txt
